chapter.title: Overview
chapter.para: Darktable is an application to manage and develop your digital images...

row.entry: This section describes the layout of the userinterface.

sect2.title: Filmstrip
sect2.para: The filmstrip views the same images as is viewed in lighttable with respect to filter and sort orders and are turned on/off with key accel ctrl-f. Filmstrip provides some actions to apply on images when you are not in lighttable mode, you can for an example when in darkroom mode and developing an image, switch to another image to develop by doubleclicking the thumb in the filmstrip...

The filmstrip does also provide some actions to be performed on image under the mousepointer and here follows a table of available key accelerators for specific actions.
1 - 4 set the rating of the image, if an image has 1 star and you hit the 1 key the image will be unrated
F1 - F3sets a color label for the image
ctrl-ccopy the historystack of the image
ctrl-vapply the copied historystack onto the image
